title: Sam Gowland makes savage move as he cuts ex Chloe Ferry out of throwback snap
text:

Love Island's Sam Gowland has made his most savage move yet as he dangerously cut out his ex Chloe Ferry, 24, from a Vegas throwback snap.

Sam has proved he's a brave man as he posted the photo to Instagram which still revealed half of Chloe's arm wrapped around her former flame, with the rest of her body completely cropped out.

He made no reference at all to his ex girlfriend in the caption, and instead penned that it's been a whole year since he watched the Conor McGregor versus Khabib fight - not mentioning she was by his side.

Sam flashed a beaming grin in the photo while wearing a smart suit as he enjoyed the fight with his then beau, and in his favourite throwback snap, he questioned where the time had gone.

(Image: instagram)

The 24-year-old let his pals do the talking instead, as they found the ordeal hilarious.

One user said: "Crop job if I’ve ever seen one ✂️", as another added: "Love u sam funny man cutting out Chloe".

A third admitted: "Savage as f**k!"

(Image: instagram)

Their long-winded romance ended in disaster, as Sam called his Chloe a "compulsive liar" after she accused him of having sex with Love Island co-star Amber Davies just a day after they ended things.

Sam, who met Chloe after leaving the villa in 2017 and even joined her on Geordie Shore, has claimed Chloe has made up the claims after she said she discovered incriminating messages on his laptop.

(Image: Instagram)

The drama broke when Chloe tweeted a snarky message to Amber, who had posted a picture of herself captioned: "Looking at my boyfriend who doesn't yet know he’s my boyfriend x."

Chloe quote-tweeted it, adding: "Aye after you shagged mine!!"

The Geordie pair didn't hold back when it came to dishing out the dirt on social media, as it was publicised by them both.
description: The Geordie Shore star has taken their bitter split further and posted a snap where he savagely cropped Chloe out
